players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's gone. We need to figure out the mafia. Any suspicions?"
You: "Bob's silence makes me suspicious. We should discuss why he didn't speak up."
You: "I believe Bob is still our biggest suspect due to his silence. Let's vote him out today."
Bob: "I have nothing to hide. I believe Alice's accusation against me is baseless, and I was merely following the protocol of not revealing my investigation results during the day."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob

Alice: "I believe Bob is still our biggest suspect due to his silence. Let's vote him out today."
